title: Hmm...  need to simplify the site template
summary: Some point soon, I think I need to meddle with the site templates again and strip every adornment. Make them as simple as possible. It's fairly plain now, but I need to get it minimal-yet-not-plain. Too much light makes the baby go blind. Or something.
content:
Some point soon, I think I need to meddle with the site templates again and strip every adornment. Make them as simple as possible. It's fairly plain now, but I need to get it minimal-yet-not-plain. Too much light makes the baby go blind. Or something.
